definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to call upon others for help

sentences.english: One trade group has turned to a rock band called Gyoko, or Fishing Port.
sentences.chinese: 某個行業團體已經求助一個叫做“漁港”的搖滾樂隊。

sentences.english: Yellow to porch suffer Hong Kong police, who had to go to taking home for help.
sentences.chinese: 黃以軒遭受香港警方通緝，只好前去去晏家求助。

sentences.english: You'll have had practice in writing a letter asking for help.
sentences.chinese: 你將會學習到寫一封求助信。

sentences.english: I shouted to the pedestrians for help, but no one stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我大喊着向行人道上的路人求助，但是沒有人停下來。

sentences.english: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌進了迦百農，有一個百夫長前來求助。

sentences.english: Every time I had a problem, I would turn to Mr. Wang for help.
sentences.chinese: 每一次遇到問題，我都會向王老師求助。

sentences.english: Half suffocated he takes refuge in the park round the house.
sentences.chinese: 幾近窒息，他開始求助於房外的公園。

sentences.english: He turned to me and said , I shall turn to my teacher for help.
sentences.chinese: “他轉過頭來對我說，”我將向老師求助。

sentences.english: He appealed to his country's nativism.
sentences.chinese: 他求助於這個國家的排外主義。

sentences.english: Finally, the mayor of Little Rock appealed directly to President Eisenhower for help.
sentences.chinese: 最後，小巖城市長只好直接求助艾森豪總統。

sentences.english: Cui Zhen fact appeals to police ransack nitty-gritty , but at job of no help.
sentences.chinese: 崔真實向警方求助搜查事實真相，但於事無補。

sentences.english: Appeals to local elected officials and the Regents went nowhere, they say.
sentences.chinese: 他們說求助於當地競選官員，董事會就哪都去不了。

sentences.english: He used to turn to me for help.
The teacher ran from the bus to get help.
sentences.chinese: 那個老師跑下公交車去求助。

sentences.english: Herein eventually the appearance in order to solve the emotional problems, the initiative to stand stand for help.
sentences.chinese: 最終綽姿爲了解決情緒問題，主動向立勳求助。

sentences.english: If you a special favour, you have to go through the director.
sentences.chinese: 你如果想特殊照顧，你必須求助於主任。

definition: to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
assistance/a helping hand/to lend a hand
to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
to report a case to the authorities
